perturbation.original_text:
EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY SET FORTH IN THIS ARTICLE 6, THE PARTIES MAKE NO WARRANTIES OR REPRESENTATIONS
TO THE OTHER PARTIES AND EACH PARTY HEREBY DISCLAIMS ANY AND ALL OTHER WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED,
INCLUDING THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, NON-INFRINGEMENT AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
perturbation.changed_text:
EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY SET FORTH IN THIS ARTICLE 10, THE PARTIES MAKE NO WARRANTIES OR REPRESENTATIONS
TO THE OTHER PARTIES AND EACH PARTY HEREBY DISCLAIMS ANY AND ALL OTHER WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED,
INCLUDING THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, NON-INFRINGEMENT AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
perturbation.explanation: The warranty disclaimer has been moved from Article 6 (Limited Warranties) to Article 10 (Other Arrangement), making it less likely to be noticed and understood by a party reviewing the warranty terms. This misplacement obscures the disclaimer's relevance to the warranty, potentially undermining its enforceability.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Uniform Commercial Code (UCC) - Implied Warranty of Merchantability

perturbation.original_text:
Notwithstanding anything stated to the contrary in this Agreement, the Parties acknowledge that any breach of Section 2.5
[***]of this Agreement and/or the non-disclosure clause in Section 12.17 of the China JV Operating Agreement by a Party would cause irreparable
harm to the other Parties, and that the damages arising from any such breach would be difficult or impossible to ascertain. As such, the Parties
agree that a Party shall be entitled to injunctive relief and other equitable remedies in the event of any breach or threatened breach of Section 2.5 of
this Agreement and/or the non-disclosure clause in Section 12.17 of the China JV Operating Agreement. Such injunctive or other equitable relief
shall be in addition to, and not in lieu of, any other remedies that may be available to that Party. The Parties shall be entitled reasonable attorney
fees and costs of enforcement of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
Notwithstanding anything stated to the contrary in this Agreement, the Parties acknowledge that any breach of Section 2.1
[***]of this Agreement and/or the non-disclosure clause in Section 12.17 of the China JV Operating Agreement by a Party would cause irreparable
harm to the other Parties, and that the damages arising from any such breach would be difficult or impossible to ascertain. As such, the Parties
agree that a Party shall be entitled to injunctive relief and other equitable remedies in the event of any breach or threatened breach of Section 2.8 of
this Agreement and/or the non-disclosure clause in Section 12.17 of the China JV Operating Agreement. Such injunctive or other equitable relief
shall be in addition to, and not in lieu of, any other remedies that may be available to that Party. The Parties shall not be entitled reasonable attorney
fees and costs of enforcement of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The section numbers referenced for injunctive relief have been changed to sections that do not exist or have different meanings. This creates confusion and could prevent a party from seeking appropriate legal remedies. Additionally the parties aren't intitled to attorney fees and costs of enforcement.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Remedies for Breach of Contract

perturbation.original_text:
1.2
Incorporation by Reference
 
Section 12 (Miscellaneous) of the China JV Operating Agreement shall be incorporated by reference into and form an integral part
of this Agreement, mutatis mutandis.
perturbation.changed_text:
1.2
Incorporation by Reference
 
Section 13 (Miscellaneous) of the China JV Operating Agreement shall be incorporated by reference into and form an integral part
of this Agreement, mutatis mutandis.
perturbation.explanation: Changing the section number of the China JV Operating Agreement that is incorporated by reference introduces uncertainty as to the actual terms being incorporated, potentially leading to disputes and undermining the clarity and enforceability of the agreement.
